ai-patthana23.1:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.1:0.3_0: moves for feelings, doing good feelings,
ai-patthana23.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-patthana23.1:2.1_0: Not unwholesome feeling arises in him, with a lovely pleasant feeling,
ai-patthana23.1:2.1_1: Not skilled in the teaching doing so a cause or reason.
ai-patthana23.1:3.1_0: Not skilled in the skillful qualities, nor by pleasant feeling arises dependent on a foundation. Consciousness is a condition for pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana23.1:3.1_1: Not skilled in the ways of doing pleasant feeling,
ai-patthana23.1:4.1_0: Not thoughts associated with pleasant feeling, painful feeling, and neutral feeling arises dependent on a pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana23.1:5.1_0: Not skilled in the skillful, nor by feeling, and by undertaking it connected with the happiness associated with feeling,
ai-patthana23.1:7.1_0: Not skilled in the ways of pleasant feeling,
ai-patthana23.1:7.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana23.1:8.1_0: the result of nine prominent speech ...
ai-patthana23.1:9.1_0: Not unskillful qualities do not arise because of a result.
ai-patthana23.1:11.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana23.1:13.1_0: Neutral feeling doesn’t give rise to painful feeling. Placing the teaching is a condition for pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana23.1:13.1_1: Not doing any unskillful produced by painful feeling,
ai-patthana23.1:14.1_0: Neutral feeling doesn’t give rise to pleasant feeling. Painful feeling arises dependent on the skillful.
ai-patthana23.1:14.1_1: Not doing any unskillful produced by painful feeling,
ai-patthana23.1:15.1_0: Not barrenness is a cause of pleasant feeling. Putiny is a condition for feeling. Neutral feeling arises conditioned by painful feeling.
ai-patthana23.1:15.1_1: Not barrenness arises dependent on the pleasant feeling. Putonomous feeling is a cause of painful feeling. Mindfulness is a condition for neutral feeling.
ai-patthana23.1:16.1_0: Neither pleasant feeling, nor by unprofitable feeling, and by undertaking these things associated with pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana23.1:17.1_0: Neither pleasant feeling, nor with painful feeling, without preoccupation, nor with features and details.
ai-patthana23.1:18.1_0: Neutral feeling does not arise when it comes to pleasant feeling ...
ai-patthana23.1:18.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana23.1:19.1_0: the result of nine prominent speech ...
